s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position (with engine stopped) and check that MIL (1) lights.
If MIL does not light up but engine can be starting, go to MIL does not Come ON with Ignition Switch in ON Position and Engine Stopped (but Engine Can be Started):N32A for troubleshooting.
If MIL does not light with ignition switch in ON position and engine does not start though it is cranked up, go to ECM Power and Ground Circuit Check:N32A .
Start engine and check that MIL turns OFF.
If MIL remains ON and no DTC is stored in ECM, go to MIL Remains ON after Engine Starts:N32A for troubleshooting.
